entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is trying to get a new wand from Ollivander.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wand maker who is helping Harry choose a new wand.

entities.name: holly and phoenix feather
entities.description: The materials used to make the wand. Ollivander mentions that it's made of holly and phoenix feather.

relationships.description: Harry is interacting with Ollivander to get a new wand. They are discussing the wand's materials and its repairability.
Harry is trying to get a new wand made of holly and phoenix feather. He is interested in this material for his new wand.
Ollivander is giving advice to Harry about the repairability of the wand. He tells Harry that it cannot be repaired.
